title: LA-24-08: Applying the Senior Employee Post-Government Employment Restrictions to Employees Impacted by the Pay Freeze
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/E86FD96F221419AE85258B6A004B3461/$FILE/LA-24-08 - Applying the Senior Employee Post-Government Employment Restrictions to Employees Impacted by the Pay Freeze.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory explains the impact of the pay rate cap applicable to noncareer officials for 2024 on the application of the senior employee post-Government employment restrictions under 18 U.S.C. § 207(c).
